subject: Skeleton (Sport)
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Alexandros Kefalas was introduced to the sport at the Cresta Run, a unique course where competitors use equipment that is different from what is used at the Winter Olympics.
snippet: Alexandros Kefalas was introduced to the sport at the Cresta Run, a unique course where competitors use equipment that is different from what is used at the Winter Olympics.
